title: Nosey!
description: The host who never minds her own business.
quote: Today we’ll find out what makes these best friends tick… and explode!
altHero: Nosey talks into a microphone in front of her studio audience
alt3: Rocko with a bunch of microphones circling his head, some poking his face and eyeballs
alt4: audience member (Philbert in a mustache disguise) asks a question
